mapper.select:
select TGB.GUAR_NO as GUAR_NO_TEMP -- 보호자_번호_임시 , TSB.STDT_NO -- 학생_번호 , TSB.STDT_NM -- 학생_명 , TGB.ENTR_DT -- 가입_일자 , TBI.TEL_NO -- BAND전화_번호 , LIB.LOC_NM -- 위치_명 , TBI.BAND_ID -- 밴드ID , TGB.GUAR_NO -- 보호자_번호 , TGB.GUAR_NM -- 보호자_명 , TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO -- 보호자_전화_번호 , TGB.SPOS_NO -- 배우자_번호 , TSB2.SPOS_NM -- 배우자_명 , TSB2.SPOS_TEL_NO -- 배우자_전화_번호 , TSB2.SEX_CD -- 배우자_성별_코드 , TSB2.HGHT_VAL -- 배우자_키_값 , TSB2.WGHT_VAL -- 배우자_몸무게_값 , TSB2.RACE_DIV_CD -- 배우자_인종_코드 , TSB.EORG_LOC_NO -- 교육시설_위치_번호 from TM_GUAR_BASE TGB left outer join TM_STDT_BASE TSB on TGB.GUAR_NO = TSB.GUAR_NO_1 or TGB.GUAR_NO = TSB.GUAR_NO_2 left outer JOIN TM_SPOS_BASE TSB2 on TGB.SPOS_NO = TSB2.SPOS_NO left outer JOIN TS_LOC_INFO_BASE LIB on TSB.EORG_LOC_NO = LIB.LOC_NO left outer JOIN TS_BAND_INFO TBI on TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO = TBI.GUAR_TEL_NO_1 OR TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO = TBI.GUAR_TEL_NO_2 where 1=1
and TGB.ENTR_DT between replace(#{entrDtFr},'-','') and replace(#{entrDtTo},'-','')
and TSB.STDT_NO = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC
and TSB.STDT_NM like CONCAT('%',#{stdtNm},'%')
and TBI.BAND_ID like CONCAT('%',#{bandId},'%')
and TBI.TEL_NO = #{telNo}
and TGB.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC
and TGB.GUAR_NM like CONCAT('%',#{guarNm},'%')
and TGB.GUAR_TEL_NO = #{guarTelNo} ORDER BY TSB.STDT_NO, TSB.STDT_NM, TGB.ENTR_DT, LIB.LOC_NM, TBI.BAND_ID, TGB.GUAR_NO,TGB.GUAR_NM, TGB.SPOS_NO , TSB2.SPOS_NM , TSB2.SPOS_TEL_NO
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TM_GUAR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND GUAR_NO = #{guarNoTemp}
mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_guar_base.select */ SELECT TGB.guar_no as guar_no_temp , TSB.stdt_no , TSB.stdt_nm , TGB.guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ , TGB.guar_nm /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(20) */ , TGB.guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , TGB.guar_pw /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(1000) */ , TGB.self_cert_dttm /* self_cert_dttm 본인_인증_일시 character(14) */ , TGB.auto_login_yn /* auto_login_yn 자동_로그인_여부 bpchar(1)*/ , TGB.devc_cert_val /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값*/ , TGB.race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ , TGB.sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ , TGB.hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ , TGB.wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ , TGB.bmi_val /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */ , TGB.spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */ , TGB.dzone_alam_yn /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.szone_alam_yn /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.fall_alam_yn /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.hbit_abnm_alam_yn /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.temp_abnm_alam_yn /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.body_hist_alam_yn /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.meal_noin_alam_yn /* meal_noin_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.excs_noin_alam_yn /* excs_noin_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.cbee_use_alam_yn /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.batr_lack_alam_yn /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.ltrm_nuse_alam_yn /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ , TGB.entr_dt /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.rels_dt /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.rels_resn_cd /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */ , TGB.rels_resn_cntn /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(400) */ , TGB.entr_stat_cd /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ , TGB.reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ , TGB.reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ , TGB.upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , TGB.upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ , TGB.upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_guar_base TGB inner join TM_STDT_BASE TSB on TGB.GUAR_NO = TSB.GUAR_NO_1 or TGB.GUAR_NO = TSB.GUAR_NO_2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TGB.guar_no = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND TSB.stdt_no = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.select */ SELECT spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */ , spos_no as spos_no_temp , spos_nm /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */ , spos_tel_no /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ , hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ , wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ , race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ , reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ , reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ , upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ , upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_spos_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND spos_no = #{sposNo}::NUMERIC /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
mapper.insert:
select nextval('absv.tm_spos_base_seq')
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.insert */ INSERT INTO tm_spos_base ( spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */ , spos_nm /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */ , spos_tel_no /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ , hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ , wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ , race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ , reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ , reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ , upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */ , #{sposNm} /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */ , #{sposTelNo} /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ , #{hghtVal}::NUMERIC /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ , #{wghtVal}::NUMERIC /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ , #{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ , to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ , #{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ , to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ , #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_spos_base SET UPT_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , UPT_TM = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , UPT_USER_ID = #{uptUserId} , spos_nm = #{sposNm} /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */ , spos_tel_no = #{sposTelNo} /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ , sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ , hght_val = #{hghtVal}::NUMERIC /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ , wght_val = #{wghtVal}::NUMERIC /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,race_div_cd = #{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ WHERE 1=1 AND SPOS_NO = #{sposNo}::NUMERIC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tm_spos_base WHERE 1=1 AND SPOS_NO = #{sposNo}::NUMERIC
mapper.select:
select coalesce(TTAD.GUAR_NO, #{guarNo}::NUMERIC ) as GUAR_NO , fn_getCdNm('TERM_DIV_CD',TTB.TERM_DIV_CD) as TERM_DIV_CD_NM , TTB.TERM_DIV_CD , TTB.TERM_VER , coalesce(TTAD.TERM_AGRE_YN , 'N') as TERM_AGRE_YN , TTAD.TERM_AGRE_DTTM from TI_TERM_BASE TTB LEFT outer join TM_TERM_AGRE_DETL TTAD on TTB.TERM_DIV_CD = TTAD.TERM_DIV_CD and TTAD.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::NUMERIC where 1=1 order by TTB.TERM_VER,TERM_DIV_CD_NM, TTAD.TERM_AGRE_DTTM
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}

select b.spos_no , a.guar_no from tm_guar_base a inner join tm_spos_base b on b.spos_no = a.spos_no inner join ts_band_info c on (a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_1 or a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_2) and c.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' where 1 = 1 and a.entr_stat_cd != '90' -- 해제 and a.rels_dt is null and a.rels_resn_cd is null and exists(select 1 from ts_band_info x inner join tm_guar_base y on (y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_1 or y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_2) and y.entr_stat_cd != '90' -- 해제 and y.rels_dt is null and y.rels_resn_cd is null where x.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' and c.band_id = x.band_id and y.guar_no = ${guarNo}::NUMERIC) and a.guar_no != ${guarNo}::NUMERIC

select a.guar_no from TM_GUAR_BASE a inner join TM_SPOS_BASE b on a.SPOS_NO = b.SPOS_NO inner join ts_band_info c on (a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_1 or a.guar_tel_no = c.guar_tel_no_2) and c.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' where 1=1 and exists(select 1 from ts_band_info x inner join tm_guar_base y on (y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_1 or y.guar_tel_no = x.guar_tel_no_2) and y.entr_stat_cd != '90' -- 해제 and y.rels_dt is null and y.rels_resn_cd is null where x.band_open_stat_cd = 'NORM' and c.band_id = x.band_id and y.guar_no = ${guarNo}::NUMERIC) and a.guar_no != ${guarNo}::NUMERIC
